chapter.metadata: The hallway is dark. Only illuminated by the small amount of moonlight coming through the door windows, and the red EXIT sign at the end of the hallway. You know you should probably go to the exit and find your way home, but part of you wants to explore the rest of the school. Youâ€™ve never seen it past closing.
chapter.text: You enter a corridor,^500 blank concrete walls stretch to the left and right.
